alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...An area of torrential rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Worcester and northwestern Middlesex Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms over Ayer, or 9 miles northeast of Leominster. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Westford, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Littleton, Lancaster, Ayer, Shirley, Harvard, Boxborough, Bolton and Dunstable. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County
